Preheat the oven to 150C/300F/Gas 2.Toss the beef and flour together in a bowl with some salt and black pepper.Heat a large casserole until hot, add half of the rapeseed oil and enough of the beef to just cover the bottom of the casserole.Fry until browned on each side, then remove and set aside.
